title: Business Analyst
description:
Title: Business Analyst with Business Banking

Experience: 9 to 15 Yrs

Notice Period: 15 Days or Less

Location: Pune

Job Description


Experience of SME domain, Core Banking for SMEs (must), Account Onboarding (optional)
Experience of evaluating the requirements and writing Business Requirements documents
Breaking down the requirements from all stakeholders including business, IT, Support, Architecture
Supporting Business and project team with clarifications and requirements sessions
Understanding of the APIs and able to create the necessary mappings within the systems
Ability to understand the solution diagram and map to requirements
Creating Traceability matrix of requirements, designs, testing
Review the functional documents from vendors and support business discussions


Please DO NOT apply if your profile does not meet the job description or required qualifications.

Irrelevant applications will not be considered.
